name: io.github.andrasfe/vulnicheck
description: HTTP MCP Server for comprehensive Python vulnerability scanning and security analysis.

environment_variables.description: API key for NIST National Vulnerability Database (increases rate limit from 5 to 50 requests per 30 seconds)
environment_variables.name: NVD_API_KEY

environment_variables.description: GitHub token for Advisory Database access (increases rate limit to 5000 requests per hour)
environment_variables.name: GITHUB_TOKEN

environment_variables.description: OpenAI API key for LLM-based risk assessment in MCP passthrough operations
environment_variables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY

environment_variables.description: Anthropic API key for LLM-based risk assessment (alternative to OpenAI)
environment_variables.name: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY

environment_variables.description: Cache time-to-live in seconds for vulnerability data (default: 900)
environment_variables.name: CACHE_TTL

environment_variables.description: Enable HTTP-only mode with MCP client delegation (true/false, default: auto-detect)
environment_variables.name: VULNICHECK_HTTP_ONLY
